title: What does JSON stand for?

openGraph.title: JSON Diff | What does JSON stand for?
openGraph.description: Uncover the full meaning of JSON and its significance in modern web development. Learn how JSON revolutionizes data interchange.

excerpt: In the realm of programming and web development, JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) plays a crucial role as a lightweight data interchange format. It has become ubiquitous across various platforms and is a fundamental part of modern web technologies.
